ProductInfo.Features:
* 380 TV Lines for clear image resolution * 26ft (8m) infra-red night vision * Sturdy weather resistant casing * Wireless 2.4GHz transmission between camera & receiver up to 165ft (50m)* * Connect receiver to any TV, VCR or Swann Security Monitor * Camera & receiver auto switchable between 4 channels
Note: This product does not work well in the vicinity of wireless web router and Wi-Fi devices. If you have such a device you may be advised to buy Swann's ADW-300 Digital Wireless Camera & Receiver.
ProductInfo.Name: Swann NightHawk Wireless Outdoor Camera Night Vision 26ft/8m
